text: Pin Hook is an unincorporated community located in northeast Lamar County, east of Paris, Texas. ==Notable persons== * William A. Owens, author, educator and folklorist. ==References== References: William A Owens, This Stubborn Soil, New York, Scribner [1966] ==External links== * The Handbook of Texas Online Category:Unincorporated communities in Texas
title: Pin Hook, Texas
